duties_responsibilities.duty: Review Team Telecom applications and FCC license documentation related to telecommunications services sector.
Conduct due diligence and fact-finding research on foreign participation in U.S. telecommunications to assess risks.
Analyze telecommunication security issues and formulate actionable policy recommendations for DHS leadership.
Author analysis papers and produce case summaries regarding foreign participation risks.
Support evolving telecommunications and technology security policy developments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Information Technology, Computer Science, Telecommunications, or related field (Master's Degree preferred)
